item.title: Kingdom Hearts 4 Could Walk the Opposite Direction as Disney Dreamlight Valley
item.description:
Kingdom Hearts 4 is still a huge mystery in the industry right now, but the action adventure franchise is bound to have plenty of Disney franchises packed into its story. A unique blend of Disney IPs and Final Fantasy , Kingdom Hearts is a gaming franchise that truly has its own special identity. As the wait for Kingdom Hearts 4 continues, speculation has continued to arise regarding which DIsney characters will be present in the game.

Disney's franchise catalog has changed a lot since the first Kingdom Hearts game launched back in 2002. Since then, Disney has bought both Marvel and Star Wars , two of the biggest names in pop culture. There was a chance for both franchises to appear in KH3 , but that never came to fruition. However, now that fellow Disney game, Disney Dreamlight Valley , recently introduced Star Wars content, the door is wide open for KH4 to cover the Marvel representation.

After Disney Dreamlight Valley's Star Wars Content, Kingdom Hearts 4 Bringing Marvel to the Series Feels More Possible Than Ever

Before this Star Wars crossover, Disney Dreamlight Valley had remained fairly purist in its approach to Disney content, focusing mostly on the company's original animated IP. This made Disney Dreamlight Valley a compelling entry in its own right, but the arrival of Star Wars has marked a new era for the life sim game that is full of fresh potential. It's possible that Marvel could also make its way into Disney Dreamlight Valley , but KH4 may be a better option, as it would keep the latter from feeling overcrowded with franchises that aren't original Disney properties.

Disney Dreamlight Valley 's Star Wars items are available in the game's shop until May 14.

Kingdom Hearts 4 Teaming Up With Either Star Wars or Marvel Feels Inevitable

If KH4 is destined to bring Star Wars or Marvel to its world, choosing the latter may be the best choice. Of course, both could be included, but that risks overcrowding KH4 , just as it could push the limits of Disney Dreamlight Valley . The two games hinge on being tied to classic Disney, so if a modern Disney-owned franchise is going to be thrown into the mix, it will be more effective to stick to just one instead of both. Disney Dreamlight Valley has Star Wars covered, so KH4 feels set to have its own Marvel world.

Kingdom Hearts is a gaming franchise that truly has its own special identity.

Iconic locations like Stark Tower or Wakanda could be great options to serve as a centerpiece for a Marvel-based world in KH4 . Of course, there has yet to be any confirmation of KH4 embracing the superhero brand, but at this point, it would be incredibly surprising for developer Square Enix to not take the opportunity. Both Marvel and Star Wars have become massive moneymakers for Disney, and KH4 choosing to feature one of them could potentially pull in a lot of new players.

Kingdom Hearts Missing-Link , a mobile spin-off, has been delayed indefinitely. It's unclear if this has affected the development of KH4 .

Fans Still Eagerly Await Fresh Kingdom Hearts 4 News

The first trailer for KH4 was revealed in 2022 to celebrate the franchise's 20th anniversary, and since that first trailer, Square Enix has kept fairly silent about the game's progress, which has caused some fans to worry. Ultimately, no news is potentially good news, as it likely means that KH4 is simply still in production. However, 2025 is hopefully the year that will shed more light on KH4 .

Only time will tell which Disney properties are chosen to be included in KH4 . The addition of Marvel seems highly likely, but there is always room for surprises. When the game is ready, though, it will be exciting to see how KH4 chooses to shake up the series.

item.title: With No Animal Crossing Revealed for Switch 2 Yet, It May Be Time For New Horizons Fans to Bite the Bullet
item.description:
With the announcement of the Nintendo Switch 2, many Animal Crossing: New Horizons fans were expecting to hear some good news about the game’s successor. However, Nintendo has kept information about the new installment of the Animal Crossing franchise under wraps. To the bittersweet chagrin of many who enjoyed endless hours in An imal Crossing: New Horizons , no news has meant that fans have had to return to existing titles to get their Animal Crossing fix.

While the question of the Switch 2’s Animal Crossing is still up in the air, players who are revisiting New Horizons have been holding on to hope, nostalgia, and islands that may have been created all the way back in March 2020. However, with no news and almost four years without content updates, New Horizons may easily start showing its age. It may be time to approach New Horizons with new eyes—and perhaps, a new island.

The Case to Start Over in Animal Crossing: New Horizons

For players who have held onto their island since the early days of New Horizons , saying goodbye may seem like an impossible task. However, starting over doesn’t have to mean losing everything. For many players, wiping the slate clean can be creatively liberating. After years of curating specific aesthetics and min-maxing villager relationships among different Animal Crossing villager types, starting anew can return some of the magic that New Horizons offered early on. Suddenly, bugs are worth catching again. Museum donations can feel exciting instead of obligatory. Even weeds and misaligned paths can take on a kind of rustic charm.

More importantly, a new start means the next game can comparatively push boundaries. If Nintendo is preparing Animal Crossing for a next-gen evolution, then the series may expand in bold, unexpected directions. Players tied to a saved island that is fully developed and beautifully decorated could make some players hesitate to move on to the next game. A clean break opens doors.

New Horizons Was a Milestone, But Some Players May Have Reached the End of the Road

Animal Crossing: New Horizons launched in 2020 and quickly became a bestseller, praised for its quality-of-life improvements and the unprecedented control it gave players over their island environments. From terraforming to themed builds to curated villager rosters, New Horizons allowed players to craft perfect islands that truly reflected their creative muses. But while this creative freedom was exhilarating, it also means that many fans have reached the practical end of the road after five years.

Four years after the Happy Home Paradise DLC and hundreds of hours poured into daily routines, the hype around New Horizons is simply not what it used to be. Many New Horizons islands are no longer active towns. Instead, they’re curated museum exhibits often trapped in a time capsule. And since it is not likely that players will have the option to transfer over their island to the impending Animal Crossing , it may be healthiest for players seeking some new fun to either grab hold of another game while they wait, or simply start fresh.

Nintendo Rarely Looks Back

It’s worth remembering that Nintendo has a track record of prioritizing fresh starts over continuity—especially with Animal Crossing . Every mainline entry in the series has asked players to begin again, embracing the passage of time and the charm of starting over. From Wild World to New Leaf to New Horizons , the fun has always been found in discovery and reinvention, not in clinging to past layouts or item collections.

If Animal Crossing does come to Switch 2, it's unlikely to offer full data migration or allow direct transfers of entire islands. Players might retain some in-game perks or collectables through online services, but the idea of continuing a New Horizons island exactly as it is may be off the table. Fortunately, players porting New Horizons to Switch 2 can keep their islands. But given the larger history, it may be emotionally and strategically wise for longtime players to start weaning themselves off their five-star paradises now.

Letting Go Is Part of Animal Crossing’s DNA

There’s a quiet lesson at the heart of every Animal Crossing game: nothing is permanent. Villagers come and go, seasons pass, and time marches on whether a player logs in or not. The series thrives on that transience. Letting go of an old town or saying goodbye to a favorite neighbor has always been part of the experience. This time, it might be the entire island that gets left behind. It’s difficult to say farewell to a space that holds literal years of memories, but the essence of Animal Crossing lies in its gentle impermanence. It teaches patience, routine, and most of all, the joy of starting anew. Besides, not every Animal Crossing player has the choice to erase their island.

Animal Crossing's Future is Worth Waiting For

There’s still every reason to be hopeful. If Nintendo is investing in a next-gen Animal Crossing , it’s likely taking cues from what worked in New Horizons while pushing the series further. More dynamic Animal Crossing NPCs, deeper villager relationships, enhanced multiplayer, or even new types of towns and terrain could be on the horizon. But for now, in the absence of official confirmation, fans might want to take a deep breath and start saying their goodbyes. Scrap the old island. Try a minimalist run. Make peace with the idea of letting go—because the next time Tom Nook hands out a loan for a new home, it’s definitely going to be on completely new soil.

item.title: Lucky Defense Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Lucky Defense Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Lucky Defense
  • How to Get More Lucky Defense Codes

Lucky Defense is a popular tower defense game with unusual for this genre mechanics that makes it stand out from the competition. During the matches, most of your success will depend on the RNG and your reaction, but you can also influence your success by upgrading units in the main menu using Gold and other resources.

To speed up the process of developing and upgrading your units, you can redeem Lucky Defense codes. They will bring you not only Gold, but also a bunch of other rewards such as experience, Draws and Diamonds.

Updated May 11, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are currently no active codes available for Lucky Defense . The developers may release new codes in future updates or events, so it’s a good idea to check back regularly. Staying up to date can help you grab free rewards as soon as they’re available.

All Lucky Defense Codes

Working Lucky Defense Codes

There are no active Lucky Defense codes at this time. Bookmark this page and visit back later, we will be sure to post new codes as soon as they become available.

Expired Lucky Defense Codes

There are currently no expired Lucky Defense codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

In Lucky Defense , you will need a lot of time to develop your account and upgrade your units. Codes, in turn, can significantly speed up these processes and simplify the gameplay in general.

How to Redeem Codes for Lucky Defense

Redeeming Lucky Defense codes will not take you long, however, if you are a beginner you will need to complete the tutorial before you can access the desired option. Once you've done that, check out our guide that will explain what to do to redeem Lucky Defense codes and get your rewards in this mobile game.

  • Launch Lucky Defense .
  • Go to the main menu.
  • Here, in the upper right part of the screen, you will find a hamburger button. Click on it.
  • This will open a drop-down list with several buttons. Among them, interact with the first one which says Settings.
  • By doing so, you will open the Settings menu. Here, find and interact with the “Enter Coupon Code” button.
  • This will open the redemption page. Here, in the Coupon Code field, enter one of the working codes from the list above.
  • Lastly, click on the Claim Gift button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, the rewards will be credited to your account.

How to Get More Lucky Defense Codes

The developers of Lucky Defense are actively working on the game's social media and periodically post new codes for this free mobile game there. Here's a list with links to all the official pages so you can check them out for yourself:

  • Official Lucky Defense Discord server.
  • Official Lucky Defense Reddit account.

Lucky Defense is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox: Jailbird Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Jailbird is an exciting Roblox game that allows you to participate in multiplayer matches. There are lots of different guns that you can use to shoot your enemies at any distance. Also, Jailbird has various promo codes that you can use to get some free bonuses. Here, we will tell you about these Jailbird codes and explain to you how to redeem them.

Updated May 11, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Jailbird has just added a batch of new codes packed with useful rewards, including exclusive YouTuber's skins, boosters, and a solid amount of cash. These fresh drops are great for gaining a quick edge, whether you're just starting out or diving into the latest content. With several older codes still working, it's a good time to load up on gear and perks. Stick around for more updates and future releases.

All Jailbird Codes

Working Jailbird Codes

  • 50KLIKESJAILBIRD – Gives you Cash, Credits and Co-Points. (NEW)
  • CHIVVEDYT – Gives you a Chivvedyt Skins. (NEW)
  • MADDERSYT – Gives you a Maddersyt Skins. (NEW)
  • JAILBIRD2025 – Gives you an EXP Booster and 2500 Cash. (NEW)
  • S4RELEASE – Gives you an EXP Booster and 800 Cash.
  • MADDERS – Gives you a Regular Crate and a Cash Booster.
  • JAILBIRDSTARTER – Gives you an EXP Booster.
  • JAILBIRD – Gives you 500 Cash.
  • REMASTERED – Gives you 1,000 Cash.

Expired Jailbird Codes

  • S3RELEASE
  • 50KLIKESJAILBIRD
  • MAJORUPDATEMAY
  • SEASON2YAY
  • 30KLIKESJAILBIRD
  • 10KLIKESJAILBIRD
  • 35KLIKESJAILBIRD
  • 15MILJAILBIRD
  • THANKSFORWAITING
  • Season2Release
  • 100KFAVJAILBIRD
  • 10MILJAILBIRD
  • 25KLIKES
  • 20KLIKESJAILBIRDYAY
  • 7MILJAILBIRD
  • 20KLIKES
  • 1MILJAILBIRD
  • 70KFAVOURITES
  • 6MILJAILBIRD
  • 5MILJAILBIRD
  • 15KLIKES
  • BETAJAILBIRD

If you want to get more weapons in Jailbird , you will need to farm Cash. With this currency, you can purchase lots of new items that you can use to create the best loadout for your character. So, you should definitely redeem all promo codes that allow you to get some free Cash as they will help you buy the things you need.

Also, there are various boosters that you can get by redeeming some of these codes. They are very useful and help you progress faster in Jailbird .

How to Redeem Jailbird Codes

In order to get your Cash, Credits, and Boosters, you will need to learn how to redeem Jailbird codes. This process is simple, and you can perform it the same way as in other Roblox experiences. Follow the steps below to use promo codes and claim your rewards:

  • Launch Jailbird . Wait for the game to load.
  • After that, look at the top left corner of your game screen. There, you will find a button that says “Promocode”.
  • Click on the Promocode button and a menu will pop up.
  • Enter the code you want to redeem.
  • Click on the Claim button. The reward is yours.

How to Get New Jailbird Codes

The developers of Jailbird can create new Roblox promo codes and if this happens, we will add them to this guide. So, you can bookmark it and check it for updates from time to time. Also, you can follow the official media related to Jailbird :

  • X Account
  • Roblox Group
  • Discord Server

item.title: Roblox: Radiant Residents Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Radiant Residents Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Radiant Residents
  • How to Get More Radiant Residents Codes
  • How to Play Radiant Residents

Radiant Residents is a survival horror game that will put Roblox fans in a nuclear apocalypse. Players only have 60 seconds to search the house and collect everything they need to live in the bunker. However, the supplies are not enough to survive, as deadly events regularly occur, so Radiant Residents codes will come in handy. There are different types of bunkers that can be purchased for Sanity Points, which can be earned not just by surviving and buying for Robux, but also by entering the Radiant Residents codes found on this page.

Updated May 11, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Radiant Residents offers several codes that can help you earn extra Sanity Points. These rewards give you a quick boost and can be useful as you explore the game’s unique features. While the rewards aren’t game-changing, they’re still worth claiming. Be sure to check back often in case new codes are added.

All Radiant Residents Codes

All Active Radiant Residents Codes

  • CHRISTMAS - Enter this code to get 300 Sanity Points.
  • WACKYWORLDS - Enter this code to get 200 Sanity Points.
  • BBQ - Enter this code to get 350 Sanity Points.
  • Outbreak - Enter this code to get 400 Sanity Points.
  • BETA - Enter this code to get 300 Sanity Points.

All Expired Radiant Residents Codes

  • 1YEAR - Enter this code to get 500 Sanity Points.

How to Redeem Codes in Radiant Residents

Usually, in Roblox games, codes are straightforward to enter as the buttons for entering them are integrated into the interface. In Radiant Residents , codes are redeemed in just a few clicks, but players who do not know how to do this can use the instructions below:

  • Open Roblox and launch Radiant Residents .
  • There are three buttons on the right side of the screen. Click the purple one, Open Shop.
  • An interface will pop up in the lower-left corner, in which there is an Enter Code Here field. Enter or paste the code there.
  • Press Enter to redeem the code.

How to Get More Radiant Residents Codes

Players can find more codes by joining the Discord server or following the game creator's YouTube channel. This article is updated regularly as well, so fans can also find all the active codes here.

How to Play Radiant Residents

After players collect supplies, they will enter the bunker. Over time, their satiety, health, etc. will decrease. It is necessary to manage supplies wisely because they can only be replenished on dangerous expeditions outside.

At first, everything will seem quite simple, but over time, survivors will encounter various problems and events that need to be dealt with. Occasionally, a toilet or generator will break down and players will need to repair it as quickly as possible by completing simple puzzles.

It is important for survivors to monitor the vents as monsters can get through them, so it is necessary to set traps or close the ventilation shafts. During the events, enemies also appear right in the bunker, which must be quickly destroyed together using sticks that any player can equip at the beginning.
